title: execute 计分板 其他

replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2015-10-25 11:14
/execute @a ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,c=5] text X
打错，抱歉是5格，不是5个

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2015-10-25 11:22
/execute @a ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,r=5] text X
那么让在空气中的僵尸给自己加一分呢？

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
840196733mw 发表于 2015-10-25 22:45
那么让在空气中的僵尸给自己加一分呢？

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
840196733mw 发表于 2015-10-26 19:28
脚那一个
/execute @e[type=Zombie] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ air 0 execute @e[type=Zombie,r=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ air 0 execute @e[type=Zombie,r=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~1 ~ air 0 scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,r=0] text 1
